name: RELIVE (itch) (KoopHaussgames)
description:
The setting takes place not too long from now. An alien race now governs the world. Our leaders have chosen submission over annihilation.  

Here in the U.S. all states have been segregated into districts and bordered off by massive walls and terrain. Each district designed as a utopia of peace and governed by a Community Leader and each state by a Council that answers to the alien beings.

Many have conceded to this harmonious way of life, conforming or becoming indoctrinated and given purpose of duty, enforcing the new law.

Fewer have faith in the invader's benevolence. Instead believing "They" are concealing a more sinister plan through a ruse of security and benefactions. These few are the rebels continuing the fight against domination, but at what cost?

Waking up alone in a frozen tundra, Tom must find the six beacons that will open a gate that leads outside the borders of his district. His goal is to reunite with his family. That is, if they survived.

From the Creator to the Audience:

"This is somewhat how I would describe a full fletched out game, but this is not that... this game is a prototype for an idea. This is my first attempt and is an artistic approach. Since I am a novice solo developer, I obviously have over-used and under-utilized many tools and techniques that should be used for game development, which is why I look forward to any insight, suggestions, and help to push this project forward."

"Thank you to all the artists whose work I used in the development of this game and to all those who play it. I am certainly not discouraging donations. All forms of encouragement are welcomed and appreciated."
